relation: Referred to the committee on Transportation
Hearing scheduled for 02/05/2014 from 11:00 AM-02:00 PM in A-2
Hearing scheduled for 03/05/2014 from 01:00 PM-04:00 PM in B-2
Accompanied a study order, see H4443
title: Actions for Bill H.3038
textBeforeTable: (b) The secretary of transportation shall issue those regulations it considers necessary or appropriate to implement this act. Section 1. (a) Notwithstanding any general or special law to the contrary, any motor vehicle designated as a battery electric vehicle (BEV), also known as an electric car, by the U. S. Environmental Protection Agency or National Highway Traffic and Safety Administration, shall be authorized for travel on lanes designated for use by high-occupancy vehicles. SECTION 19, chapter 90 of the General Laws is hereby amended by inserting after section 19L the following:- Miscellaneous Bill History Bill Text Print Preview Download PDF
